com.controller.entities

Class HeroController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.controller.entities.EntityController
      • com.controller.entities.HeroController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeroPowerups, HeroWin

    public class HeroController
extends EntityController
    The hero of the game. The player controls directly all the X and Y positions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HeroController(float x, float y)
      New Hero Model, spawning on a specific position, in this case the middle of the screen.
